name: Brander Studio
description:
We have proved reputation. We work with market leaders such as “Kyivstar” – the biggest Ukrainian mobile operator, “Comodo” - global software company, Ukrainian bank “Megabank”, the biggest jewelery Internet shop “Zolotoy vek” and others.

We are sophisticated in product delivery. We were founded in 2009, and we have delivered more than 200 products.

We have expertise in Fintech solutions creation. We provided mobile & web solutions for 5 banks and more than 10 currency exchange services.
We are professionals at eCommerce custom development. We have created more than 50 shops. One of our works, “Zolotoy Vek,” is a leader of Ukrainian market of jewelery selling industry
